participant_1.background:
I'm often a bit of a klutz, but I'm always trying to improve my coordination.
Every Sunday, I sing in the choir and then go for a drive to clear my mind.
my favorite subject in school was science.
I grow my own potatoes and experiment with new seasonings.
My family are avid cyclists as well

participant_2.background:
My power tools are my most valued material possessions because they allow me to express my creativity and make my home a better place.
I have a dog named Snowball who keeps me company when I'm recovering from my knee surgery.
I like to watch The Repair Shop when I need some inspiration for my own car repairs.
I fear that I will not be able to help my patients as well as I want to.
i hate tomatoes.

content.text: Hello! I'm doing okay, thanks for asking.
Great! What are you up to today?
Not much, just hanging out with my dog and watching some TV.
That sounds nice. I'm actually in the middle of a choir practice right now.
Oh cool! I love to sing in the shower, but I'm not very good at it.
It's always fun to sing, no matter how good you are!
That's true! What kind of music do you like to sing?
I like to sing a variety of music, but my favorite is probably country music.
I love country music too! Do you have a favorite artist?
I really like Blake Shelton and Carrie Underwood.
Oh yeah, they're both great! I also like Luke Bryan and Kenny Chesney.
Those are some good ones too! I'm glad to meet someone else who likes country music.
Me too! It's not very popular where I live, so it's nice to find someone who shares my interest.
I know what you mean. I'm lucky that my family all loves country music too.
That's awesome! I wish my family liked it more.
Well, we can always be friends and sing together!
